@realDonaldTrump 【Can Chinese medicine help American friends】

Prevention of covid-19 decoction: licorice 10g and dried ginger 10g then add 3 liters of water ，after the fire boil, simmer for 15 minutes, utill it left about 1.5 liters of water, 3-6 times a day to drink. https://t.co/fjra655WBP
